collection_holder_name: Recorded Sound Section, Library of Congress
pageContext.collection_title: Manfred Frank DeMartino Collection of Radio Scripts
pageContext.collection_description: Scripts (some autographed by performers) and a photograph acquired by DeMartino while working backstage at CBS during the mid-1940s. Includes scripts for The Frank Sinatra Show, April 26 and December 4, 1944, Philip Morris Playhouse, January 27, February 11 and February 18, 1944, and Your Hit Parade, October 16, 1943, April 8, 1944 and August 25, 1945. The scripts include advertisements for sponsors.
